short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: X-Ray, Function Templating and other useful tools to accelerate your Xano development.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supercharge your Xano development experience with exclusive power tools.

State Change X-Ray (Free): Identify common issues that can cause crashes in your function stacks. Quickly work the list to eliminate your challenges!

Performance X-Ray (Members Only): Find which parts of your workspace take up more resource and drill down to the function stacks, looking at both quantity and per-run costs. 

Database Auto-Documentation (Free): Export your database schema to DBML to quickly generate a diagram and documentation

Edit Function Stacks Faster (Members Only): Change tables and functions with ease, and export lines of your function stack across workspaces without limitations. (More expansive than the built-in copy-paste)

Template and deploy functions across workspaces (Members Only): Even functions with dependencies can get copied with their dependent add-ons, tables and functions. When you already have one installed (e.g. a users table) just tell it to use the existing table instead of creating a new one - its as easy as picking from a list! 

Additional features:

- Improve awareness by adding your current workspace to the title bar
- Improve security by turning off auto-CRUD creation on new tables
- Improve your confidence by tracking hard-to-find health statistics of your instances at all times
- Works on all Xano instances, including administering in custom domains
